translations: 散布，散置；点缀；在……中夹杂某物

sentences.sentence: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
sentences.translation: 原本是想用现代场景点缀历史场景。

sentences.sentence: Prose-oriented XML, in particular, tends to intersperse PCDATA and tags rather freely.
sentences.translation: 尤其是面向散文的 XML 往往会任意散布 PCDATA 和标记。

sentences.sentence: Intersperse your advertisements by using the playlist editor to add interstitial advertisements in your server side playlist.
sentences.translation: 通过使用播放列表编辑器在服务器端播放列表中添加间隙广告，来散布您的广告。
